text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActSuppliedItemDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-AdministrationDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-SupplyDetectedIssueCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActSuppliedItemDetectedIssueCodeActSuppliedItemDetectedIssueCodeIdentifies types of detected issues regarding the administration or supply of an item to a patient.

name: ActSuppliedItemDetectedIssueCode
title: ActSuppliedItemDetectedIssueCode
description: Identifies types of detected issues regarding the administration or supply of an item to a patient.
